texts: Be careful not to mix up the letters 'I ' and 'O ' with the numbers '1 ' and '0 '.
Choose the correct country of registration. You risk getting a penalty if you pick the wrong one.
This is based on the vehicle details entered and information held today by the DVLA and TfL. It may change without notice.
UK-registered: If your vehicle's make and model details have not been returned, make sure you entered the Vehicle Registration Mark correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the UK: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm this is the correct vehicle to continue.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"What if my vehicle details are incorrect?"}
If the number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark) is correct but the description shown is wrong, you can still continue.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA so you'll need to let the DVLA know if your details are wrong or need to be updated.
Our records show that this vehicle does not have the correct vehicle tax class to qualify for the discount.
If these details are incorrect you can still continue with your application. You will need to send us documentation showing that the vehicle meets the correct tax class if you continue.
Our records show that this vehicle does not have the correct vehicle tax class to qualify for this discount.
However, based on the Vehicle Registration Mark you have entered and the classification information held by the DVLA or DVANI and TfL, you do not have to pay the Congestion Charge on this day.
If you believe that this information is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, then click 'Confirm' and continue to select your charges.
This information is correct as of todayâ€™s date but may change without notice. You should always check to see if payment is required for travel within the zone.
This vehicle is currently exempt from Congestion Charge. This may change at any time and you can still continue.
